skin.title: XE Official Skin + PlannerXE123(v3.2.0)
XE Official Skin + PlannerXE123(v3.2.0)
XE Official Skin + PlannerXE123(v3.2.0)
XE Official Skin + PlannerXE123(v3.2.0)
skin.description: The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)

The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)

The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)

The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)

The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)

The PlannerXE123 skin is designed to operate any XE board modules but it tested only board/bodex module. Base skin: xe_official skin dece24 (http://naradesign.net/, zero@zeroboard.com) mada (http://blog.naver.com/mada79/, mada79@naver.com)
